descript.abstract: Philadelphia is divided into 66 wards, which are the second smallest units of the city. Each ward contains no fewer than 10 and no more than 50 divisions. Ward leaders are elected by their party's committee people. A Political Ward is a division of a city for representative, electrol, or adminstrative purposes. Metadata updated 09/21/2012
descript.purpose: A Political Ward is a division of a city for representative, electrol, or adminstrative purposes. Metadata updated 09/21/2012

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Political Wards are divisions of the city primarily used for polling.
